trans-unit.source: Represents the kind of event that has occurred on a view of a control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Representa o tipo de evento que ocorreu em uma exibição de um controle no tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is provided to the designer component by the design host, for example [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], when raising an event caused by certain user actions on the design-time view of a control.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> objeto é fornecido para o componente de designer pelo host de design, por exemplo [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], ao gerar um evento gerado pela determinadas ações do usuário na exibição de um controle de tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento é manipulado por um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> Delegar método, que usa uma <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objeto como um parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> class is a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> classe é um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> Delegar método compara o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propriedade estática <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> campos para determinar qual tipo de ação gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised under the following circumstances:
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um evento é gerado nas seguintes circunstâncias:

trans-unit.source: You click a region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Clique em uma região na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The designer draws a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O designer desenha um controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: You enter or exit template editing mode for a control.
trans-unit.target: Insira ou saia do modo de um controle de edição de modelos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe fornece um delegado de padrão para manipular o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle personalizado substituem o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> métodos para processar os eventos para o controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the type of action on the design surface, and then passes the object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o host de designer uma <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> de objeto para o tipo de ação na superfície de design e, em seguida, passa o objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objeto indica que tipo de ação:

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propriedade fornece os argumentos de evento que são específicos para o tipo de ação.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for a click on a designer region.
trans-unit.target: Indica que um evento de exibição foi gerado por um clique em uma região de designer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> Delegar método compara o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propriedade estática <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> campos para determinar qual tipo de ação gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> to indicate that you clicked a region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> objeto é igual a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> para indicar que você clicou em uma região na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe fornece um padrão <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.

trans-unit.source: If the event type is <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>, the delegate calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se o tipo de evento for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>, as chamadas de delegado a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to handle click events on a region at design time.
trans-unit.target: Derivando de classes de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> método para lidar com eventos em uma região de clique em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments indicate which designer region was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos do evento indicam a região de designer que foi clicado, se houver.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for drawing a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Indica que um evento de exibição foi gerado pelo desenho de um controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> Delegar método compara o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propriedade estática <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> campos para determinar qual tipo de ação gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> to indicate a paint event on the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> objeto é igual a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> para indicar um evento de pintura no controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe fornece um padrão <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.

trans-unit.source: If the event type is <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>, the delegate calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se o tipo de evento for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>, as chamadas de delegado a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method to handle click events on a region at design time.
trans-unit.target: Derivando de classes de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> método para lidar com eventos em uma região de clique em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for changing the template mode of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: Indica que um evento de exibição foi gerado pela alteração do modo de modelo de um controle de designer.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> Delegar método compara o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propriedade estática <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> campos para determinar qual tipo de ação gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> to indicate that the template editing mode changed for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> objeto é igual a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> para indicar que o modelo de modo de edição é alterado para um controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe fornece um padrão <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.

trans-unit.source: If the event type is <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>, the delegate sets the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o tipo de evento for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>, o representante define o valor para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Custom designers that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> method to perform additional processing when the template editing mode changes for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Designers personalizados que são derivados do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> classe pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> método para executar processamento adicional quando as alterações para um controle na superfície de design do modo de edição de modelo.
